      • generateGroups

        public void generateGroups()
                    throws exceptions.TooManyOperandsException,
                           exceptions.CellAlreadyInGroupException,
                           exceptions.CellHasNoGroupException,
                           exceptions.GroupCellsNotContiguousException
        Generates the groups for the KenKen
        Throws:
        exceptions.TooManyOperandsException - when an operation has too many operands
        exceptions.CellAlreadyInGroupException - when a cell is in more than one group
        exceptions.CellHasNoGroupException - when a cell has no group
        exceptions.GroupCellsNotContiguousException - when the cells of a group are not contiguous
